query.pigql: q = load "PROMO_COMPLIANCE"; q = filter q by {{ row(Date_of_audit_Year_Date_of_audit_Month_52.selection, [0], ["min","max"]).asDateRange("date('Date_of_audit_Year','Date_of_audit_Month','Date_of_audit_Day')") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Country_2.selection, ["Country"]).asEquality("Country") }}; q = filter q by {{column(City_5.selection, ["City"]).asEquality("City") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Commune_42.selection, ["Commune"]).asEquality("Commune") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_type_11.selection, ["Customer_type"]).asEquality("Customer_type") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Trade_Format_8.selection, ["Trade_Format"]).asEquality("Trade_Format") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(X4P_5P_6P_80.selection, ["X4P_5P_6P"]).asEquality("X4P_5P_6P") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Top_Customer_49.selection, ["Top_Customer"]).asEquality("Top_Customer") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_48.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Local_Outlet_Name_49.selection, ["Local_Outlet_Name"]).asEquality("Local_Outlet_Name") }}; q = filter q by {{column(Channel_9.selection, ["Channel"]).asEquality("Channel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Subchannel_10.selection, ["Subchannel"]).asEquality("Subchannel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Store_type_46.selection, ["Store_type"]).asEquality("Store_type") }};  q = filter q by {{column(Sales_region_44.selection, ["Sales_region"]).asEquality("Sales_region") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Sales_area_6.selection, ["Sales_area"]).asEquality("Sales_area") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Sales_territory_7.selection, ["Sales_territory"]).asEquality("Sales_territory") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Field_Execution_Manager_53.selection, ["Field_Execution_Manager"]).asEquality("Field_Execution_Manager") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Store_Operations_Manager_54.selection, ["Store_Operations_Manager"]).asEquality("Store_Operations_Manager") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Field_Sales_Manager_55.selection, ["Field_Sales_Manager"]).asEquality("Field_Sales_Manager") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_division_15.selection, ["Product_division"]).asEquality("Product_division") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_category_16.selection, ["Product_category"]).asEquality("Product_category") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Country_21.selection, ["Country"]).asEquality("Country") }}; q = filter q by {{column(Country_90.selection, ["Country"]).asEquality("Country") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(X4P_5P_6P_66.selection, ["X4P_5P_6P"]).asEquality("X4P_5P_6P") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(X4P_5P_6P_92.selection,["X4P_5P_6P"]).asEquality("X4P_5P_6P") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Region_85.selection, ["Sales_region"]).asEquality("Sales_region") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Region_93.selection, ["Sales_region"]).asEquality("Sales_region") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Channel_27.selection, ["Channel"]).asEquality("Channel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Channel_94.selection, ["Channel"]).asEquality("Channel") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_category_26.selection, ["Product_category"]).asEquality("Product_category") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Product_category_95.selection, ["Product_category"]).asEquality("Product_category") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_31.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer") }}; q = filter q by {{ column(Customer_96.selection, ["Customer"]).asEquality("Customer") }}; diff = group q by all; diff = foreach diff generate avg('Promo_Compliance') as 'Percent_Diff', (case when avg('Promo_Compliance')  < 0.5 then "#EE0A50" when avg('Promo_Compliance')  < 0.7 then "#F8CE00" else "#0FD178" end) as 'color';

q = load "PROMO_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }} && 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }} && 'Trade_Format' in  {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }} && 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }} && 'Product_market' in {{selection(Product_market_56)}} && 'Product_brand' in {{selection(Product_brand_57)}} && 'Product_sector' in {{selection(Product_sector_58)}} && 'SKU' in {{selection(SKU_84)}} && date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["5 months ago".."5 months ago"]; q = group q by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); q = foreach q generate 'Product_category' as 'Product Category', 'SKU_ID' as 'SKU ID', 'SKU' as 'SKU', avg('Priority_Promo') as 'currentPromo';

q = load "PROMO_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }} && 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }} && 'Trade_Format' in  {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }} && 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }} && 'Product_market' in {{selection(Product_market_56)}} && 'Product_brand' in {{selection(Product_brand_57)}} && 'Product_sector' in {{selection(Product_sector_58)}} && 'SKU' in {{selection(SKU_84)}} && date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["6 months ago".."6 months ago"]; q = group q by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); q = foreach q generate 'Product_category' as 'Product Category', 'SKU_ID' as 'SKU ID', 'SKU' as 'SKU', avg('Priority_Promo') as 'lastPromo';

q = load "PROMO_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }} && 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }} && 'Trade_Format' in  {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }} && 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }} && 'Product_market' in {{selection(Product_market_56)}} && 'Product_brand' in {{selection(Product_brand_57)}} && 'Product_sector' in {{selection(Product_sector_58)}} && 'SKU' in {{selection(SKU_84)}} && date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["5 months ago".."5 months ago"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["6 months ago".."6 months ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_category',last::'Product_category') as 'Product_category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', avg(cur.Priority_Promo) as currentPromo, avg(last.Priority_Promo) as lastPromo, (case when avg(cur.Priority_Promo) is null then coalesce(0-avg(last.Priority_Promo), 999) else coalesce(avg(cur.Priority_Promo)-avg(last.Priority_Promo),999) end) as 'promoAverage'; diff = foreach diff generate Product_category as 'Product_category', SKU as 'SKU', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', (case when promoAverage != 999 then promoAverage when currentPromo is null then (-lastPromo) else (currentPromo) end) as Percent_Diff;

q = load "PROMO_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }} && 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }} && 'Trade_Format' in  {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }} && 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }} && 'Product_market' in {{selection(Product_market_56)}} && 'Product_brand' in {{selection(Product_brand_57)}} && 'Product_sector' in {{selection(Product_sector_58)}} && 'SKU' in {{selection(SKU_84)}}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["5 months ago".."5 months ago"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["6 months ago".."6 months ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_category',last::'Product_category') as 'Product_category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', coalesce(avg(cur.Priority_Promo)-avg(last.Priority_Promo),999) as 'promoAverage', avg(cur.Priority_Promo) as currentPromo, avg(last.Priority_Promo) as lastPromo; diff = foreach diff generate Product_category as 'Product_category', SKU as 'SKU', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', (case when promoAverage != 999 then promoAverage when currentPromo is null then (-lastPromo) else (currentPromo) end) as short_Bar;

'Promo_Compliance_LV' >= 0; diff = group q_A by all full, q_B by all; diff = foreach diff generate (avg(q_A.'Promo_Compliance'))-coalesce(avg(q_B.'Promo_Compliance_LV'),0) as 'Percent_Diff',(case when parameters.text: This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart lists all the audited SKUs for Promo compliance in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were Promo compliance in the latest month, and the variance from the previous month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in MT enrolled stores across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Channels in the country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Product categories in the country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant,  and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for the country for the selected audit date.

This chart lists all the audited SKUs for Promo compliance in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were Promo compliance for the selected audit date, and the variance from the previous month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in enrolled stores in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in 4P, 5P and 6P stores in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant,  and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were Promo Compliant in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Promo compliant for the country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant in different sales regions of the country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in 4P, 5P and 6P stores in the country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the latest month.
This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Promo compliant for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in enrolled stores in different sales regions of the country for the selected audit date.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in MT enrolled stores across all the Product categories in the country for the selected audit date.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were Promo Compliant for the selected audit date.
